ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | issrng.o | |- O = ( oppR ` R ) |
| 2 |  | issrng.i | |- .* = ( *rf ` R ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_issrng | |- ( R e. *Ring <-> ( .* e. ( R RingHom O ) /\ .* = `' .* ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simplbi | |- ( R e. *Ring -> .* e. ( R RingHom O ) ) |
